articles.description: James Blunt appeared on Loose Women earlier today, where he claimed his number one hit You're Beautiful is for Janet Street Porter on her 75th birthday
articles.content: It's been more than 16 years since James Blunt's iconic hit You're Beautiful was first released into the charts and it has remained a constant in weddings and engagements, while living rent free in o… [+1859 chars]

articles.description: The 'Van Gogh Alive' exhibit will be spending a few months in Edinburgh city centre, giving locals and visitors a chance to experience the interactive features.
articles.content:
Edinburgh is set to see a huge Van Gogh exhibit arrive in the city centre, with a custom-made building to be constructed in Festival Square.
